login.errors.invalid.long: The username and password that you entered did not match our records. Please double-check and try again
login.errors.email_unchecked.long: Please follow the instructions mailed to you during registration
signup.errors.first_name_invalid: First name must not contain digits
signup.errors.last_name_invalid: Last name must not contain digits
signup.errors.username_req: You must enter username to continue
signup.errors.username_invalid: only letters a-z, digits 0-9, dashes (-), underscores (_), apostrophes (') and periods (.)
signup.errors.username_invalid.long: Username must contain only letters a-z, digits 0-9, dashes (-), underscores (_), apostrophes (') and periods (.)
signup.errors.email_req: You must enter email to continue
signup.errors.password_req: You must enter password to continue
signup.errors.password_min.long: Password must contain at least 8 symbols
signup.errors.password_repeat_req.long: You must enter your password again to continue
signup.errors.agree_req: you have to agree to the Terms
signup.errors.agree_req.long: You have to agree to Terms before registering
signup.warns.password_weak: password is weak - consider adding more symbols
signup.warns.password_weak.long: Password is weak. Consider adding more words or symbols
signup.success.title: Registration success
signup.success.check_email: Please check your email for further instructions.
signup.page.title: Create new account
signup.page.motivation: Connect with parents and education professionals from around the world to make education better for all children in all schools and families worldwide.
